FAQ.title: What is HomePro?
FAQ.description: HomePro is a home care platform that connects homeowners with professional service providers offering a wide range of home services, including repairs, maintenance, cleaning, and more.

FAQ.title: Are the service providers on HomePro reliable and qualified?
FAQ.description: Absolutely! HomePro ensures all service providers go through a rigorous vetting process, including background checks, qualifications verification, and customer reviews. We prioritize connecting you with professionals who meet high standards of reliability, skill, and professionalism. Your home is in safe hands with our trusted network of experts.

FAQ.title: What if I have an issue or complaint about a service provider?
FAQ.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you encounter any issues or have a complaint, HomePro provides a dedicated support team to assist you. Simply reach out to us through our platform, and we'll work to resolve the matter promptly. We're here to ensure you have a seamless and worry-free experience.

FAQ.title: How are payments handled on HomePro?
FAQ.description: HomePro offers secure and transparent payment solutions. Once your service is complete and you're satisfied, payments can be made directly through the platform. Our system ensures your payment is safe and tracks all transactions for your convenience. No hidden fees, just simple and secure payments.

FAQ.title: How do I leave a review for a service provider?
FAQ.description: Sharing your feedback is easy and important! After the service is complete, you can rate and review the provider through your HomePro account. Your reviews help other homeowners make informed choices and allow us to maintain a high-quality network of professionals. Your opinion matters!
